dc_creator_sm: Research Data Services (RDS), Columbia University Libraries
dc_description_s: This is a scanned version of the 1750 paper map entitled: A New and Accurate Map of the Empire of the Great Mogul : Tgether With India on Both Sides the Ganges, and the Adjacent Countries. Drawn From the Most Approved Modern Maps and Charts: the Whole Being Regulated by Astron. Observations.  The map was scanned at 300 dots per inch and is in the TIFF format.
dc_title_s: A New and Accurate Map of the Empire of the Great Mogul : Tgether With India on Both Sides the Ganges, and the Adjacent Countries. Drawn From the Most Approved Modern Maps and Charts: the Whole Being Regulated by Astron. Observations, 1750
